item.title: V8Js Patches merged
item.description: Today the last pull request in a series of contributions to the V8Js PHP extension has been merged. Good time to loose some words on the project and why I like it, so here we go :-) V8Js is a PHP extension that integrates Google’s V8 JavaScript engine into PHP. This is the extension allows you to execute JavaScript code securely sandboxed from PHP. Besides it allows for simple exchange of data from PHP to JavaScript and back.
